name: BeniSu - Beneath the Surface
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 29

First attempt at Ludum Dare and didn't really know what I was doing but was fun exercise. Even if I didn't get much time to actually work on it.

Simple game where you must protect your home world from invasion from above by absorbing the invaders into the planet instead of letting them crash down.

Controls:

Mobile - Hold side of screens to move left/right and hold centre of screen to absorb the invaders so they don't hit the surface.

Desktop - Keyboard left, right to move and hold down to absorb the invaders so they don't hit the surface.
